derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent. (denoting a triangular piece of timber used in a roof): of unknown origin

entry.tran: 链轮;(胶片的)输片齿轮;(磁带的)带齿卷盘
entry.def: A sprocket is a wheel with teeth around the outer edge that fit into the holes in a chain or a length of film or tape in order to move it round.

means.word_mean: 1. roller that has teeth on the rims to pull film or paper through
2. thin wheel with teeth that engage with a chain
3. tooth on the rim of gear wheel
